component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
header false java.lang.String Header text
footer false java.lang.String Footer text
close false java.lang.Boolean true Displays a "close" icon on the header
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true
Boolean value whether to allow the user to drag the Panel using its header.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean false
Makes the dialog resizable.
underlay false java.lang.String shadow
Specifies the type of underlay to display under the Panel. Possible values: none|shadow|matte
modal false java.lang.Boolean false
Boolean value that specifies whether the document should be shielded with a partially transparent mask to require the user to close the Panel before being able to activate any elements in the document.
visible false java.lang.Boolean false
Sets the element's "display" style property to either "block"(true) or "none" (false)
constrainToViewport false java.lang.Boolean false
Boolean value to keep the tooltip panel inside the confines of the size of viewport
x false java.lang.Integer -1 Sets the element's "left" style property
y false java.lang.Integer -1 Sets the element's "top" style property
fixedCenter false java.lang.Boolean false
Boolean value that specifies whether the component should be automatically centered in the viewport on window scroll and resize
width false java.lang.String Width of the element in pixels
height false java.lang.String Height of the element in pixels
effect false java.lang.String Effect to be displayed when showing and hiding the dialog, valid values are FADE or SLIDE
effectDuration false java.lang.Double 1.0 Duration of effect in seconds
zindex false java.lang.Integer -1 zindex property to control overlapping with other elements
minWidth false java.lang.Integer Integer.MIN_VALUE Minimum width of a resizable dialog.
minHeight false Integer.MIN_VALUE java.lang.Integer Minimum height of resizable dialog.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container of dialog.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container of dialog.
